jNab.core.protocol
Class AbstractRequest

java.lang.Object
  jNab.core.protocol.AbstractRequest
Direct Known Subclasses:
HTTPRequest
public abstract class AbstractRequest
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract representation of requests coming from bunnies, whatever the kind of protocol used.

Field Summary
protected  java.lang.String protocol
          Protocol used by the request, must be HTTP.
 
Constructor Summary

          Creating a new request instance by reading the incoming request and parsing it.

Constructor Detail

AbstractRequest

protected AbstractRequest(java.io.InputStream in)
                   throws MalformedRequestException
Creating a new request instance by reading the incoming request and parsing it.

Parameters:
in - the stream used to read the request.
Throws:
MalformedRequestException - if the data read from the input stream is not a well-formed request.
